nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Slaves of the Republic (TPB)
Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Slaves of the Republic is the first trade paperback in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars comic series. It was released on December 2, 2009.

Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi discover a dastardly plot by Count Dooku–to enslave the entire city of Kiros and its Togruta population! Along with Padawan Ahsoka Tano–a Togruta herself–Anakin and Obi-Wan accept a mission to liberate the droid–occupied city. But the Togruta have disappeared! Our Jedi's search for the missing citizens leads them to a place in the galaxy where pirates and slavers reign. They must find the Togruta before Count Dooku can carry out his master plan!
Despite being released as 6 full size comic issues, this TPB was released in the smaller "digest" format shared by the Clone Wars graphic novellas series. The reason for this change is unknown.
This is a gallery of different cover variations of Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Slaves of the Republic (TPB).
